title: Trump Is Gone, Drake, Bruce Willis, Sheryl Underwood and more.
itunes:title: Trump Is Gone, Drake, Bruce Willis, Sheryl Underwood and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The crew is talking about 45. Let's get it on! The Chief Love Officer is being stalked and must address the hall pass topic. Drake's new picture got the ladies on the show speaking a different language. Friday's jackpot is $750 million and Steve breaks it down on the way he will spend it if he wins. Steve's nephew made a helluva song and we got it right here. Big Dog is in rare form! Sheryl Underwood is back to talk about Trump's impeachments. She also stays extra time to tell us how she really feels. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve gives us a friendly suggestion connected directly to expectation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Drake's new picture got the ladies on the show speaking a different language. Friday's jackpot is $750 million and Steve breaks it down on the way he will spend it if he wins. She also stays extra time to tell us how she really feels. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve gives us a friendly suggestion connected directly to expectation.
